description: Pleroma: An efficient and flexible fediverse server
special: Generalist Pleroma instance with cat ears and other fun custom mods
The answer to floppy.tokyo. Pleroma instance with custom Vaporwave-styled theme.
Mastodon instance by the owner of niu.moe. Tries to bring back all the old niu memories. Also with custom theme.

description: We host free internet services for you and your friends
special: Mastodon instance with custom theme. Queer-owned, hosted in Germany and using green energy.

description: QOTO: Question Others to Teach Ourselves. A STEM-oriented instance.
special: STEM-oriented instance with own custom mods and themes. Also perfect for writers, because of the character limit (65535).

description: ieji is romaji for 家(house)路(street), together it means “the way home / a home / homeland”
special: Generalist Mastodon instance from Germany. Uses FOSS whenever possible. Can be accessed via Tor.

description: One of the first Mastodon instances, there is no specific topic we’re into, just enjoy your time!
special: Big generalist instance from Germany. One of the first few Mastodon instances.

description: ｃｙｂｒｅｓｐａｃｅ: the social hub of the information superhighway
moderation: Probably blocks known bad actors, don’t be stupid, tag your stuff etc.
special: Glitchy-hackery instance style. Can also count themselves to the “first few”

description: blob.cat, an instance for blobcats (blobfoxes are ok too)
moderation: Blocks instances that do active harm to their users, don’t be stupid, tag your stuff, etc.
special: Blobcat-themed Pleroma instance. Very friendly community.

description: The network of 10k Misaka clones! Now powered by Misskey.
special: A Misskey instance which is home for Misaka clones!

description: The happiest place on the internet
A berserker's gateway to the Mastodon social network. Run by a Norwegian, with servers in Finland.

special: Undertale-themed Pleroma instance, queer- and leftist run

description: A generalist Mastodon instance with a nice domain name. Running on Glitch Social's fork with a custom theme!
